description: Ceiling of n*phi^3, where phi is the golden ratio, A001622.
comments: This sequence, beginning at 5, gives the positions of 1 in the infinite binary word A188187; complement of A188188.  [_Clark Kimberling_, Mar 23 2011]
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
